name: Planet Basket 2009 2010
summary: Experience in the Italian basketball championship with Planet Basket 2009/2010 , the video game with all the players, teams and official courts of the 2009/10 League. Travel the field with your favorite team to an exciting challenge with more rivals than ever; customize your favorite player for 1vs1 duels; Immerse yourself in the official championship to reach the game for the title, experience the thrill of the playoffs until the end!
